ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ cups canned sloppy joe sauce
2 (8 ounce) cans refrigerated reduced-fat crescent rolls

cookingTips: Brown ground beef thoroughly and drain excess fat before adding sloppy joe sauce
Unroll crescent dough and lay it flat in the baking dish, pressing seams together
Bake at 375°F until crescent rolls are golden brown and puffed, about 15-20 minutes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook understand how to layer crescent roll dough with sloppy joe filling to create an easy casserole-style dinner.
